entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @BillOReilly OMG, No.  What a stupid question!  Americans know that people contracting Covid-19 may be a death sentence!  We have Trump in the White House who doesn’t care how many people die!  Sad!
